definition: to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: No others were injured in the incident, police said.
sentences.chinese: 在这个枪击事件中没有人受伤，警方说。

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 验尸报告称，这位四岁小孩的父亲被枪击中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: More folks are killed by dwi than guns.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，比起枪击更多的人可是死于醉驾的。

sentences.english: And she passed a crime scene where somebody was shot on the street.
sentences.chinese: 目睹了街道边的一起枪击案。

sentences.english: They say he used a military-style assault rifle to carry out the shooting spree.
sentences.chinese: 他们称，他使用一支军用突击步枪实施了此次枪击案。

sentences.english: This is an issue dramatizing the fact that after the shooting incidence took place, the government did not provide all the information.
sentences.chinese: 这正显示在枪击案发生后，政府没有提供所有的资讯。

sentences.english: They go out on patrol, and they get shot at or attacked almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 他们外出巡逻，几乎每天都会遭遇枪击或者受到进攻。

sentences.english: The two witnesses who saw the shootings were able to identify who had fired first.
sentences.chinese: 这两位目睹了枪击过程的证人认出了谁先开的火。

sentences.english: She was one of the victims of a shooting last Saturday in Tucson, Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 她是上周六亚利桑那州图桑市枪击案的受害者之一。

sentences.english: All these give off the sensation of Old West shoots.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些，让人感觉象是看旧的西部枪击片。

sentences.english: The fabulous, careful beat balances a glinting series of keyboard puffs against what sounds like a gun cocking.
sentences.chinese: 华丽的，精细的节奏平衡了如同枪击一样的重击音。

sentences.english: While there were reports of shooting, it was unclear how many died.
sentences.chinese: 目前仍有枪击的报告，死亡人数尚不明了。

sentences.english: A child shot in a friendly-fire incident?
sentences.chinese: 一名小孩受到友军枪击？

sentences.english: When someone is shot with a weapon, the bullet and firearm can be traced.
sentences.chinese: 有人被枪击中，我们能追踪到子弹和使用的武器。

sentences.english: The policeman was justified in shooting the criminal in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 那个警察出于自卫枪击罪犯是正当防卫。

sentences.english: Nor the mumblings and shots that rise from dreams on call.
sentences.chinese: 也不知道想有就有的梦中发生的含糊话语和枪击。

definition: to open fire/to shoot a gun
